data.news_body:
The meeting of Board of Directors of Archidply Industries Limited (the 'Company') is held today, i.e. on Friday, May 20, 2022 that commenced at 12:30 PM and concluded at 01.40 pm inter alia, considered and approved the following:
1. The Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Results along with Audit Report for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022, which had been duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee.
